title: Razorpine
summaries: The Razorpine is a Hardmode, post-Plantera magic weapon that rapid-fires 2-4 green "pine needle" projectiles at a high velocity. The projectiles drop off after a modest distance, much like Throwing Knives and the Magic Dagger, though with a slightly longer range. The Razorpine is dropped by the Everscream during the Frost Moon event with a 3.11% ~ 7.78% (6.22% to 31.11%) chance depending on the current wave.

statistics.Damage: 48 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 58 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Magic)
statistics.Sell: 9 GC
